data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a suite of modules that are used to run the CPAN search
    engine at http://cpan.uwinnipeg.ca/htdocs/cpan-search.html. The
    CPAN::Search::Lite::* namespace was chosen after discussions with
    Elaine at search.cpan.org, so as not to possibly lead to confusion
    with the software running search.cpan.org. There are two main types
    of modules included - set up and maintain the database, and an
    interface to perform queries. Some sample Apache mod_perl handlers
    with Template-Toolkit pages are also included to provide a web
    interface, as are some sample scripts providing a SOAP interface.
